DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Progression Indeterminate Finding Basis Report Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term not previously mentioned that represents the kind report used as the basis for a finding of indeterminate progression.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Progression Indeterminate Finding Basis Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm._Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._The fundamental assumptions underlying an explanation or a relation that provide the foundation for something._A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The worsening of a cancer over time.
